name: Telit_xE910
keywords: GSM, Modem, GPRS, 2G, IoT, Telit, GE910, LE910
description: Enables GSM/GRPS network connection using the GSM/GPRS modules. Use this library to make/receive socket connections with Telit xE910 module.This library also allows you to connect to internet through the GPRS networks and either use HTTP(S) Web Clients and Servers.
